item.title: New scripter in need of help, PLZ
item.dc:creator: @maleficus maleficus
item.description:
@maleficus wrote:

ok first thing is my code:

[code]
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// :SCRIPT CREATED BY MALEFICUS: //
// PLEASE CONTACT MONKEY_POO22@HOTMAIL.CO.UK IF YOUR’RE HAVING ANY //
// PROBLEMS //
/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// IGNORE THIS //
program powerminer; //
var rocksmined,x,y,mine:integer; //
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// SETUP //
const //
rockcolor=2503250; //
///////////////////////////END OF SETUP LEAVE ME ALONE////////////
procedure mining;
begin
if(FindColorSpiralTolerance(x,y,RockColor,5,5,514 ,337,5))then
movemousesmooth(x,y)
wait(1000+random(500))
if(FindBitmapToleranceIn(mine,x,y,6,6,126,23,1))then
begin
getmousepos(x,y)
clickmouse(x,y,true)
wait(3000+1000)
rocksmined:=rocksmined+1;
end;
end;

procedure loadbitmaps;
begin
mine := BitmapFromString(17, 17, ‘z78DADD94DB0’ +
‘A80200C407F69B38BFAA8ADFFFFA5861B44880F6952B60303 D9F4’ +
‘A0E000AA2282874573EF18C4B2DB7D65522EF590671C6D142 9B45’ +
‘8783F831E2DDAA225810601428B45B8545DAA76B00872BE5A DC09’ +
‘CC8C69B1E8FB64F7D2D5A396628F5826E62F16C3E0F016E9A 9B2D’ +
‘C0EB16433A7EE1FBD3CA53F603900F40458C2’);
end;
begin
loadbitmaps;
repeat
mining
writeln(’//////////////////////////////////////////////’);
writeln(’//this script was bought to you by maleficus//’);
writeln(’//mined ‘+inttostr(rocksmined)+’ rocks so far//’);
writeln(’///////////////////////////////////////////////’);
until(false)
end.[/code]

when i try run my code it says there’s a data error in line 30 where my bitmap named ‘mine’ begins.

also as you can see my script is a powerminer and i was thinking of adding a few more features, just some simple setup stuff.

here’s one part of it:

Const
rockcolor=2503250;
howmanyores=1000;
rockwait=2000;

all i want to know is what procedures do i need to add for the howmanyores and rockwait constants to work? please don’t call me a noob

Read full topic
item.source: New scripter in need of help, PLZ
